description: Proposal: Full description of parent app: Demolition of existing buildings at 34-40 White Church Lane and 29-31 Commercial Road and erection of building to provide a flexible use commercial space (Use Class E) at ground floor and residential units (Use Class C3) above with new public realm, cycle parking and all associated works. (as amended by PA/21/02688).Minor Material Amendments to Planning permission Ref: PA/15/02527, Dated 16/12/2016:Amendments include:1) Removal of the basement space;2) ReconBefore determining the application we would be grateful to recieve your comments.Please click on the following link to look up details of the above planning application, including any submitted documents and drawings:
site_name: 34-40 White Church Lane And 29-31 Commercial Road, London, E1
